name: AR-Distro
readme:
# AR-Distro

Distribución Drupal gratuita del Gobierno Nacional.

Desarrollamos AR-Distro como exten
summary:
Summary:

AR-Distro is a free Drupal distribution developed for the National Government. It is designed to provide a ready-to-use Drupal solution for government organizations. The distribution includes pre-configured modules and settings to streamline the deployment and management of Drupal-based websites for government entities.

name: barra-de-accesibilidad
description: Plugin que incorpora opciones de accesibilidad a cualquier sitio
readme:
# Barra de "Herramientas de Accesibilidad"
# Instrucciones y Notas (marzo 2017)

La barra de "Herram
summary:
Summary:

The GitHub repository contains a plugin that adds accessibility options to any website. The plugin includes an "Accessibility Tools" bar that provides various accessibility features, such as font size adjustment, contrast settings, and text-to-speech functionality. The README.md file provides instructions and notes about the plugin, which was updated in March 2017. The plugin aims to enhance the accessibility of web content for users with different needs or preferences.

name: cofra

readme:
# Cofra

Sistema de rendición de caja chica. Permite tener un seguimiento, control y generación de l
summary: The GitHub repository is a system for petty cash reporting. It allows for the tracking, control, and generation of petty cash expenditures. The system is designed to provide a structured and organized way for users to manage and account for small expenses within an organization.

name: drupal-argentina-borrador
description: Esta es una distribución de un componente utilizado en el portal de centralizacion de organismos publicos. Solución creada por la Subsecretaría de Gobierno Digital de la República Argentina en el periodo 2015-2019.
readme:
# drupal-argentina-borrador
Esta es una distribución de un componente utilizado en el portal de cent
summary:
Here is a summary of the GitHub repository based on its description and README.md content:

This repository contains a distribution of a component used in the centralization portal of public organizations. The solution was created by the Undersecretariat of Digital Government of the Republic of Argentina during the period 2015-2019. The repository is called "drupal-argentina-borrador" and is a draft version of the component.

name: drupal-argentina-distro

readme:
# drupal-argentina-distro
Esta es una distribución pública del portal de centralización de organismo
summary:
Summary:

This GitHub repository contains a public distribution of the portal for centralizing public agencies, created by the Undersecretariat of Digital Government of the Argentine Republic between 2015-2019. The repository is a Drupal-based distribution, as indicated by the repository name "drupal-argentina-distro".
